name: Textventure - Mars
description:
Decide the fate of the last employee on Mars.

This was created for Wanderjahre Games' "Finish It" Narrative Game Jam.

I had tried creating a choose-your-own-adventure engine for text-based browser games before but had never been able to make out quite how to do it.

Revisiting this project 8 months later I was able to rebuild it from the ground up with reasonable performance and mobile support. All done in vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Do feel free to report any performance issues or bugs.
